en: The story continues through the generations.
From Jacob comes Judah—and through his line, a king.

lines: Jacob was the father of Judah.
Judah was the father of Perez.
Perez was the father of Hezron.
Hezron was the father of Ram.
Ram was the father of Amminadab.
Amminadab was the father of Nahshon.
Nahshon was the father of Salmon.
Salmon was the father of Boaz.
Boaz was the father of Obed.
Obed was the father of Jesse.
Jesse was the father of King David.

question.en: What do you notice about how the story continues across generations—and where it leads?
